evoter.server.http

Class ServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.http.ServerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler

    @Service
public class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler
    This class is an extension of HttpHandler to manage HttpRequest
    It receives all requests sent to Server and forward requests to correct services
    After service classes finish processing request, a response is returned and it is written back client request
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ServerHandler.ThreadHandler
      This class will get parameter map from HttpExchange
      and request uri and then forward this request to services
      All requests has been checked UserDAO.USER_KEY to guarantee the security
      except login, logout, reset password and register account requests

      Methods

      void handle(com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange httpExchange)
      All coming requests will handled by this method
